mapper.insert: insert into myjeju_stofaq values(#{id}, #{sid}, 'st_'||sequ_myjeju_store.nextval, #{st_content}, sysdate, null, null)
mapper.update: update myjeju_stofaq set re_content = #{re_content}, re_time = sysdate where st_id = #{st_id}
